articles.description: The novel coronavirus pandemic is “not necessarily the big one,” World Health Organization (WHO) emergencies chief Mike Ryan warned Monday. “This pandemic has been very severe,” Ryan said at the global health agency’s last virtual media briefing of 2020, The …
articles.content: This pandemic has been very severe, Ryan said at the global health agencys last virtual media briefing of 2020, The Washington Post reported. It has affected every corner of this planet. But this is … [+2863 chars]

articles.author: Kellee Azar, KATU Staff
articles.title: Washington and Oregon prisons vaccinating against coronavirus - KATU
articles.description: When you think of the coronavirus spreading quickly, you think of close quarters, like shared homes, but one place you may not think of is a jail or a prison. But according to corrections departments in both Oregon and Washington, they are on the list and hav…
